description_expanded: Carote 8-Piece Nonstick Cookware Set with Detachable Handle is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for kitchen & dining. An 8-piece nonstick pot and pan set with detachable handles, making them easy to store. The chestnut-colored granite coating is PFOA-free and easy to clean. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
